refsect2.title: enum ControlTypes
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { CONTROL_TYPE_LABEL, CONTROL_TYPE_HBOX, CONTROL_TYPE_VBOX, CONTROL_TYPE_COMBOBOX, CONTROL_TYPE_SEPERATOR, CONTROL_TYPE_FRAME, CONTROL_TYPE_BUTTON, CONTROL_TYPE_CHECKBUTTON, CONTROL_TYPE_RADIOBUTTON, CONTROL_TYPE_SPINBUTTON, MAX_CONTROL_TYPES /* keep this as the last entry in the enum */ } ControlTypes;

refsect2.title: enum ControlFillwiths
enum ControlHandlers
gok_control_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new gok_control. It's the caller's responsibility to delete this.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to the new control.

refsect2.title: gok_control_delete_all ()
refsect2.para: Deletes the given control and all other controls linked to it.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the control that will be deleted.
The ID number of the control type name. Returns -1 if the control type name can't be found.
The ID number of the control handler name. Returns -1 if the control handler name can't be found.

refsect2.title: gok_control_button_handler ()
refsect2.para: pButton: Pointer to the button that was just pressed. user_data: User data that is associated with the button.

refsect2.title: gok_control_add_handler ()
refsect2.para: pWidget: Pointer to the button gets added to the handler list. HandlerType: Type of handler the button requires.

refsect2.title: gok_control_button_callback_open ()
refsect2.para: Initializes the GOK control callback handlers. This must be called at the beginning of the program.

refsect2.title: gok_control_button_callback_close ()
refsect2.para: Frees any memory used by the control callbacks. This must be called at the end of the program.
